sentences.en: a hard wooden chair
sentences.cn: 一把硬木椅

sentences.en: A hard-core group of right-wing senators had hoped to sway their colleagues.
sentences.cn: 一群骨干右翼参议员曾企图左右自己的同僚。

sentences.en: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.cn: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

sentences.en: As the day goes on, the pollen dries up and becomes hard.
sentences.cn: 日子一天天过去，花粉干结成了硬块。

sentences.en: Ella was concentrating very hard.
sentences.cn: 埃拉全神贯注。

sentences.en: hard liquor
sentences.cn: 烈酒

sentences.en: hard on the heels of Wimbledon comes the Henley Regatta.
sentences.cn: 温布尔登网球赛之后紧跟着就是亨里赛舟会。

sentences.en: He had thought long and hard before getting involved with the project.
sentences.cn: 参与这个计划之前他曾思之再三。

sentences.en: He is a hard worker and a skilled gardener.
sentences.cn: 他工作很努力，对园艺很在行。

sentences.en: He learned this lesson the hard way from his own personal experience.
sentences.cn: 吃一堑长一智，他这个教训来之不易——是从他自己的亲身经历中得来的。

sentences.en: he lived hard by the cathedral.
sentences.cn: 他住得离大教堂很近。

sentences.en: He tried hard not to smile in smug self-satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 他强忍住沾沾自喜的笑容。

sentences.en: I couldn’t convince him no matter how hard I tried.
sentences.cn: 不管我怎么努力，都说服不了他。

sentences.en: I never touch the hard stuff (= strong alcohol ).
sentences.cn: 我从来不喝烈酒。

sentences.en: I think the war must have been hard on her.
sentences.cn: 我想战争一定使她吃了不少苦。

sentences.en: I too found this story a little hard to swallow.
sentences.cn: 我也觉得这件事有点难以置信。

sentences.en: I'll work hard. I don't want to let him down.
sentences.cn: 我会努力工作。我不想让他失望。

sentences.en: If Douglas came down hard enough on him, Dale would rebel.
sentences.cn: 如果道格拉斯对戴尔太过严厉，他就会反抗。

sentences.en: if you don't like it then hard luck.
sentences.cn: 如果你不喜欢它，那真是可惜。

sentences.en: it would go hard with the poor.
sentences.cn: 这会对穷人不利。

sentences.en: it would go hard with the poor.
sentences.cn: 这会对穷人不利。

sentences.en: Many parents find it hard to discourage bad behaviour.
sentences.cn: 很多父母觉得要孩子循规蹈矩是件很难的事情。

sentences.en: My skin was hard and scaly and I itched.
sentences.cn: 我的皮肤又硬又粗糙，而且还很痒。

sentences.en: She has worked hard all her life.
sentences.cn: 她一生辛勤工作。

sentences.en: She tried her hardest to ignore what he’d said.
sentences.cn: 她竭力不去理会他说的话。

sentences.en: she would be justified in feeling hard done by.
sentences.cn: 要是她觉得受到了虐待，这完全有道理。

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: The guard eyeballed him pretty hard despite his pass.
sentences.cn: 虽然他有通行证，卫兵还是直勾勾地盯着他。

sentences.en: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.cn: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.en: the monitor flickers, which is hard on the eyes.
sentences.cn: 显示器闪烁不定，这对眼睛有害。

sentences.en: the studying is at times hard going.
sentences.cn: 研究有时是很困难的。

sentences.en: There are many who will work hard to achieve these goals.
sentences.cn: 有志之士将会共同为实现这些目标而努力。

sentences.en: there are no hard feelings and we wish him well.
sentences.cn: 我们一点不怨恨，我们希望他好。

sentences.en: These last four years have been hard on them.
sentences.cn: 过去的这四年里他们吃了不少苦。

sentences.en: they were hard at it with brooms and mops.
sentences.cn: 他们忙着用扫帚和拖把打扫卫生。

sentences.en: This year’s exam was much harder than last year’s.
sentences.cn: 今年的考试比去年的难得多。

sentences.en: Trinidad had been hard hit by falling oil prices.
sentences.cn: 特立尼达受到石油价格下跌的严重打击。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

sentences.en: You need hard currency to get anything halfway decent.
sentences.cn: 你得有硬通货才能买到还算不错的东西。

sentences.en: you'll be hard put to find a better compromise.
sentences.cn: 你很难找到比这更好的折衷办法。

sentences.en: you're being too hard on her.
sentences.cn: 你对她太严厉了。

words.tran_cn: 坚强的；勇敢的；能吃苦耐劳的；鲁莽的
强壮的人；耐寒植物；方柄凿
变硬，变坚固；变坚强；变冷酷
使…变硬；使…坚强；使…冷酷；使…麻木不仁

phrases.tran_cn: 难理解的，难懂的；缺少乐趣的
受到严重影响，受到严重打击
(英，非正式)[用于表示同情、怜悯、遗憾、可惜]真可惜；真遗憾
重摇滚；剧烈摇滚乐；硬质岩石
艰难的日子；艰难时刻；艰难时事
度过困难时刻；过得困难；步履艰难

trans.tran_cn: 困难的，硬的，有力的，努力的
trans.tran_en: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

trans.tran_cn: 努力地，猛力地，严重地，沉重地
trans.tran_en: using a lot of effort, energy, or attention
